title: Wallpaper city Guide
content:
Anyone an idea what the typeface is used for the titling?  
A picture can be seen here:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/shopcomposition/3290099285/sizes/l/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090419225338/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/shopcomposition/3290099285/sizes/l/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/shopcomposition/3290099285/sizes/l/")  
THANX A LOT!!!
author: mr_ampersand

comments.content:
I think this might be Font Bureau [Amplitude](http://web.archive.org/web/20090419225338/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Amplitude/styles), which seems to have the same sort of ’ink traps’ that I think I see in your book samples, although it is hard to be sure about that detail. The Amplitude letterform proportions seem about right.

- Mike Yanega
Yes, I have several of the guides and they are very well designed with Amplitude throughout.
